text: (he nabee!) hamane aapakee or vaise hee vahyee bhejee hai, jaise nooh aur usake pashchaat ke nabiyon ke paas bhejee aur ibraaheem, ismaeel, ishaaq, yaaqoob tatha usakee santaan, eesa, ayyoob, yoonus, haaroon aur sulaimaan ke paas vahyee bhejee aur hamane daavood ko zaboor pradaan[1] kee thee
